japanese:
（海洋博公園を後にした俺たちは、
　五つ子の希望もあって、そのまま
　古宇利島（こうりじま）まで足を伸ばすことにした）
translation:
(After leaving Ocean Expo Park, we decided to
 stretch our legs and head straight to Kouri Island,
 at the request of the quintuplets.)

japanese:
（ひとまず場所を変えれば大丈夫だろうと
　考えての選択だった）
translation:
(This was decided thinking that
 changing our location would solve things.)

japanese:
（目的地の古宇利島（こうりじま）は別名『恋島』と
　呼ばれていてカップルに人気のスポットらしく、
　どうしても行ってみたかったそうだ）
translation:
(They just had to see Kouri Island,
 also known as the 'Island of Love,'
 which is apparently a popular spot for couples.)

japanese:
（こいつらは島の海岸にあるハート型をした岩、
　通称『ハートロック』を見るのを
　楽しみにしていたのだが……）
translation:
(They were looking forward to seeing
 the heart-shaped rock on the island's coast 
 that's known as the 'Heart Rock'...)

japanese:
（さすがは人気スポットと言うべきなのか、
　そこにも大勢の観光客がいた）
translation:
(As expected of a popular spot like that,
 there were many tourists about.)

japanese:
（俺たちは周囲に注意を払いながら行動したが、
　それも焼け石に水だ）
translation:
(We had to be careful as we moved around.
 However, it was like trying to bail out a sinking boat
 with a spoon.)

japanese:
（結局、この古宇利島でも
　五つ子は周囲の注目を
　集めることになってしまった）
translation:
(In the end, the quintuplets ended up
 attracting attention, even on Kouri Island.
 It seems that our thinking was too naive.)

japanese:
（どうやら俺たちの考えが甘かったらしい。
　同じ顔で同じ格好をした人間が５人揃っていれば、
　どうしたってこうなる運命なのだろう）
translation:
(If five people with the same face and wearing the
 same clothes gather together, it's probably inevitable
 they'd attract attention like this.)

japanese:
（観光客に騒がれる前に逃げる、を
　繰り返すうちにすっかり日も暮れてしまい……
　俺たちは、それ以上の観光を諦めることにした）
translation:
(Repeating our strategy of running away before being
 noticed by tourists, the day suddenly became night...
 and we decided to give up on any further sightseeing.)

japanese:
（騒ぎを避けることに注力していた俺は、
　結局、変装を見破るヒントなどなに１つ得られず
　失意のまま宿泊先のホテルへと戻り――）
translation:
(Since I focused everything on avoiding attention,
 I couldn't gain anymore hints on how to see through 
 their disguises, and returned to the hotel in despair%p-2;――%p;)

japanese: （そして、卒業旅行４日目は終わりを迎えた）
translation:
(And with that, the fourth day
 of our graduation trip came to an end.)
